person.persName: Basil W. Duke (Kentucky, lawyer and Confederate soldier)

body.p: Kentucky attorney and soldier. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Son of Nathaniel W. Duke and Mary Pickett Currie Duke. Married to Henrietta Hunt Morgan on June 18, 1861. Attended Georgetown College in Georgetown, Kentucky. Attended Centre College in Danville, Kentucky. Graduated with law degree from Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky in 1858. Attorney and police commissioner in St. Louis, Missouri, in 1860. First lieutenant in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.), from October 27, 1861 to 1864. Brigadier general in Morganâ€™s Brigade of Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) from September 15, 1864 to 1865.
